alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Brown; Eastern Cherry; Loup; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 6:21PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN CHERRY... SOUTHWESTERN ROCK...WESTERN LOUP...BROWN AND NORTHERN BLAINE COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM CDT... At 620 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Ainsworth to 16 miles east of Elsmere to 6 miles northwest of Brewster. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ainsworth, Bassett, Brewster, Long Pine, Johnstown, Rose, Hofeld Lake, Fox Bayou, Raven, Almeria Meadow State Wildlife Management Area, Hawley Flats, Twin Lakes State Wildlife Management Area, Willow Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Long Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Duff, Koshopah, Almeria, Jones Lake, and Johnsons Corner. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 141 and 200. Highway 20 between mile markers 233 and 267. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in North Platte.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Brown; Eastern Cherry; Loup; Rock
